titles.title: Lower Regulatory Burden for Homeowners Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the definition of contribution in aid of construction.
Lower Regulatory Burden for Homeowners Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Lower Regulatory Burden for Homeowners Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include customer connection fees (including fees to connect a customer's water service line or sewer lateral line to the utility's distribution or collection system or extend a main water or sewer line to provide service to a customer) as an excludable corporate income item within the definition of "contribution in aid of construction."
